main event: Two oval-shaped objects were observed in the sky traveling at high speed in Xenia, Ohio on 18 November 1956.
interesting points: The objects were smaller than a basketball but traveled at an estimated speed of 300-400 mph.,The sighting lasted about 5 minutes and occurred at 2-3 miles distance.,There were reports of similar sightings with a connection to weather balloon tests.,The objects appeared to maneuver in a zig-zag pattern at an estimated 300-400 mph.,The observer was 16 years old and had basic educational training.
